topics.name: Numbers to 100
topics.description: Learn to count, read, write, and understand numbers up to 100.

lessons.title: Counting to 100
lessons.description: Learn to count numbers up to 100

lessons.title: Place Value
lessons.description: Understanding tens and ones in two-digit numbers

lessons.title: Comparing Numbers
lessons.description: Learn to compare numbers using greater than, less than, and equal to

topics.name: Addition and Subtraction
topics.description: Learn to add and subtract two-digit numbers.

lessons.title: Adding Within 100
lessons.description: Learn strategies for adding two-digit numbers

lessons.title: Subtracting Within 100
lessons.description: Learn strategies for subtracting two-digit numbers

lessons.title: Word Problems
lessons.description: Solve real-world problems involving addition and subtraction

topics.name: Shapes and Patterns
topics.description: Identify and describe 2D and 3D shapes and patterns.

lessons.title: 2D Shapes
lessons.description: Learn about circles, triangles, squares, and rectangles

lessons.title: 3D Shapes
lessons.description: Explore cubes, spheres, cylinders, and pyramids

topics.name: Multiplication and Division
topics.description: Learn multiplication tables and related division facts.

lessons.title: Division Facts
lessons.description: Understand the relationship between multiplication and division
